text: No code completion and syntax highlighting in Pydev
I just configured Eclipse with PyDev latest version, but when I import external modules, neither code completion nor syntax highlighting works.
Komodo Edit does a better synax highlighting, apparently.
- But Ctrl+R doesnt run the program.

I prefer a SciTE kind of editor with similar highlighting and fonts (aesthetics) and F5 working but with display of folder and files dynamically like Komodo Edit and a better code completion and vi emulation.
If I want to buy a Py IDE, Komodo or Wingware, which is better?-- Wrt syntax highlighting and code completion
